desc: In memory of our brother, who tragically took his own life in 2013. In lieu of live events during Covid-times we are running an online raffle for Guitars4Vets.

layout.text:
and we are back (Virtually)!
OUR ANNUAL FUNDRAISER FOR GUITARS4VETS *G4V*
Last year's cancellation due to Covid-19 made us pivot to online fundraising, but we were still able to raise more than $10,000! With the help of our online raffle, generous donations from friends and family, and the support of Sheet Metal Workers Local 24, the Cincinnati Building Trades and The Hatton Foundation. THANK YOU!!!!
